name: Neon Overdrive (BluetornadoKDMC, GlitchArctic)
description:
My first ever game jam game
A game where you switch colours
there is no source code as it got corrupted and we can't recover it but we just wanted to post the game if you play this please review it on its game jam page.

controls:
"Q" to switch colours
"Z" to attack
wasd or arrow keys to move

made by:
BluetornadoKDMC
Glitcharctic
